channel.title: Comments on: R.I.P. Johnithin Christ of Code of Honor (1958-2009)

item.title: By: Jay Be
item.dc:creator: Jay Be
item.description: Sorry to here about JC's passing last year ... heard today on Easter. Strange huh? Bands like COH inspire me to keep living for Truth. I know someday...we'll win! Jay in Myrtle Beach
item.content:encoded: Sorry to here about JC’s passing last year … heard today on Easter. Strange huh? Bands like COH inspire me to keep living for Truth. I know someday…we’ll win! Jay in Myrtle Beach
